home.name: Elijah Lee
home.p1: is a frontend developer who creates high quality websites with exceptional user experience.
home.p2: He has professional working proficiency in English and Korean and is well-equipped to work in a multicultural environment.

about.p: Creating exceptional products using the best tools available
about.methodology: I integrate code and design to create responsive websites that make the most of the least space. Cross browser compatibility is ensured by displaying core features on older browsers while newer browsers display enhanced features that enrich the user experience. I follow best practices and use semantic markup to ensure web content does not impede search engine crawlers or screen readers.
about.tools: My build tools include Sass, Git, Github, and NPM. I use Figma for design mockups and use NVDA to test for accessibility.

footer.about: Elijah Lee lives in Seoul, South Korea. He has an undergraduate degree in Economics from Yonsei University. His interests include artificial intelligence, virtual/augmented reality, and studying virtual economies.
